Advanced Import Specialist

Our Story

Complete automotive repair. We specialize in Toyota and Lexus but can service all vehicles. Advanced Toyota Lexus has been in its current location for more than 7 Yrs and Henry has more than 30 Yrs of automotive repair experience. For all your Toyota and Lexus service work, call us first. Proudly serving Scottsdale for over 18 years.

Henry Touw trained with Toyota in Japan under the Toyota Racing Development group (TRD) during 1978-1980, then moved to California and worked as a technician at Carson Toyota. In 1985, Henry moved to Toyota of Gardena and worked as a Toyota Master Technician. In 1990, Henry left Gardena to open his own shop in Walnut, California. Finally in 1996 Henry moved to Arizona and set up shop in Scottsdale where he has been ever since. Currently his shop, Advance Import Specialist, is located at 90th & Via Linda.

Location

Located conveniently next to the 101 & Via Linda. Just head up 90th street from Via Linda and make a left on San Victor. After that make a right into the plaza, keep going straight and you're there!
